title: ‘The Only Plane in the Sky’ Commemorates 9/11
itunes:title: ‘The Only Plane in the Sky’ Commemorates 9/11
description:
Garrett Graff Author of "The Only Plane in the Sky: A Oral History of 9/11” discusses how the book pulled together the voices of that fateful day and examined America’s loss of innocence. Joe Magnacca, CEO of Massage Envy, talks about the business of skincare and expanding into personalized wellness. 

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Paul Brennan. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
